title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 13.8 - Service of papers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 13.8 - Service of papers

State Regulations

All notices and papers connected with a hearing, other than
the notice of hearing may be served by first class mail. Except where otherwise
provided, service by mail shall be deemed complete five days after
mailing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
13.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
